title: For Sale:  Sringfield  1903 mark 1
postcontent:
This gun is awesome!!! I would say it's 99%. This gun was made in 1919. nice bore
Towards the end of the war, Springfield turned out the Model 1903 Mark I. The Mark I has a cut on the left hand side of the receiver meant to act as an ejection port for the Pedersen device, a modified sear and cutoff to operate the Pedersen device; a specialized insert that replaced the bolt and allowed the user to fire .30 caliber pistol cartridges semi-automatically from a detachable magazine. The stock was also slightly cut down on the left side to clear the ejection port. In all other respects, the Mark I is identical to the 1903.

title: Want To Buy:  AK74-style rifle chambered in 5.45x39
postcontent:
I'm looking for a plain-jane Tantal or other AKM-style rifle (no Saiga's) chambered in 5.45x39 to use in a bullpup kit I have on order. 

I'm not concerned about the condition of the furniture as the bullpup kit replaces the grip, stock and hand guard pieces, nor does it it matter if the rifle uses folding or fixed stock so long as it's a square-cut receiver (no angle-cut receivers for a thumb-hole stock) with a cleaning rod hole at the lower grip barrel flange.

I would prefer to get one that's free of any defects that would affect performance (i.e. no canting on sights or gas block, no mag wobble, no keyholing).

Paying cash, and am willing to meet in person for a private party transfer pending signed bill of sale and Missouri driver's license (or other proof of Missouri residence).

I'm also open to an FFL transfer for an out-of-state purchase if the price is right and you can work with me on shipping.

If you have something like what I've described for sale, please feel free to respond to this ad. Thank you!

Convert your FACTORY STOCK GLOCK* Handgun into a .22 LR. with an Advantage Arms Conversion Kit

EXCLUSIVE FEATURES OF OUR CONVERSION KIT: Six great reasons to purchase our .22 LR conversion kit

1. The front and rear sights are removable GLOCK OEM sights. The rear sight is adjustable for both windage and elevation.

2. LAST ROUND LOCK OPEN

The slide will lock open after the last round in the magazine has been fired. Our unique patented magazine design and heat-treated steel lock open insert allows us to offer this special and desirable feature which you can only find on 'Advantage Arms' .22LR GLOCK conversion kits.

3. INTERNAL FIRING PIN SAFETY Glock incorporated an internal firing pin safety into their guns. We thought it was important enough to include it on our conversion kits as well. Our internal firing pin safety is designed to eliminate accidental discharges from dropping the firearm.

title: For Sale:  Keltec P3AT .380 pocket pistol
postcontent:
Have a Keltec P3AT .380 pocket pistol for sale.  If you're looking for something that's easy to carry concealed, this is #1.  Good condition, shows signs of wear from being carried.  Has been carried a lot more than it's been shot.  Functions flawlessly, have not had any reliability problems, even with many different kinds of ammo.  This one has the factory gray frame, and also comes with a factory magazine grip extension.  Located in Greenville, SC.  Will only sell to a SC resident, must show SCDL to prove legal age and residence.



P-3AT
The P-3AT is a semi-automatic, locked breech pistol, chambered for the .380 Auto cartridge. It has been developed from our highly successful P-32 pistol with negligible increase in weight and size. The slidestop has been eliminated and the magazine capacity reduced to 6 rounds due to the larger cartridge. The firing mechanism is double action only. The magazine has a 6 round capacity. The KEL-TEC P-3AT is the lightest .380 Auto pistol ever made. Thanks to its locking dynamics and superior ergonometry, perceived recoil and practical accuracy are comparable to much larger guns. The P-3AT is mainly intended for plainclothes police officers as a secondary weapon, or for concealed carry by licensed citizens. The small grip size and light trigger pull make the P-3AT ideal for female shooters.

ches

 MSRP: $499.00

 You must be over 21 to own a Silencer. The NFA requires a one time per item *** $200.00 *** tax stamp on each Silencer, Short Barrel Rifle (SBR), .. basically any Class III item. The $200.00 Check or Money order is sent directly to the ATF with your Silencer paperwork. I handle all the paperwork for you. You just hand me the check to send in with the paperwork. Or if your not local I can send paperwork to you by mail. You only need sign a few spots in front of Notary and Drop in the mail with the $200 check made out to the ATF. To start paper work you pay for the Silencer and the Serial# that goes on the paperwork becomes yours. We can handle everything through the mail except the actual pickup of the Silencer. You will have to come to the shop or meet us at a gun show to take delivery after it clears the ATF.
 So for example.. if the Silencer is $479.00 plus .06% county tax = $507.74.. you gotta pay an additional $200 directly to the ATF for the TAX stamp. So total out of pocket would be $707.74. :) Average wait for paperwork to clear the ATF is 5 to 6 months.

postcontent:
See you at Big Boy's Gun Show March 16 in Stover Missouri.

Offered here is an very nice L1A1(Century R1A1) inch pattern FAL type rifle. Forget what you may have read about Century FALs, this is a VERY GOOD one! Built from all Australian inch parts, very tight, not mixed up inch/metric. Feels, handles, and shoots GREAT! This is one of the best balanced weapons I have ever held. Much lighter than you'd think.

Included in this sale is the original sling, 4x correct inch pattern 20rnd magazines, original Trilux scope & mount, & plain no-scope dust cover. Inch FALs can use either metric or inch magazines though metric mags will fit loose but still function. The more common Metric pattern guns can only use metric mags. If you don't want the scope & mount you can deduct $300 from the purchase price. If I didn't have a super nice M1A I'd never sell this gun!

title: For Sale:  M39 Finnish Mosin Nagant made in 1943
postcontent: Hello, up for sale from my personal collection is a 1943 Finnish M39 Nagant. This rifle is in very nice shape with deep blueing on barrel.All numbers match on this rifle, reciever, bolt and mag floor plate. Very rich history for this rifle. It started out as a rifle made by Remington that they made for the Czar of Russia in the early 1900's for the Russian empire. The Russians then fought the finnish and lost. The Finnish then took these nagants and accurized them with new sights and, in this example, a brand new Sako barrel, which is a company many still know today. The stock has not been refinished as it still has a light coating of whatever the Finns packed these rifles in. Finish is pretty good overall exept for reciever, but it has been through battle. I am asking $400 or best offer.Price is negotiable so feel free to shoot me an offer! text or call me at REDACTED. I live here in Portales which is about an hour and a half from Roswell.

title: For Sale:  1935 German Luger S/42 (Mauser) G-Date
location: Raleigh, NC, Raleigh / Durham / CH, North Carolina
postcontent: I have for sale a 1935 S/42 G Date German Luger. The Luger is in good Shape and is all part number matching other than the magazine. Serial # 4348. The magazine is a period correct magazine. It also has bring back papers. The grip is also cracked which you can see in the pictures. Here is a little more info below... It was made during January, 1935. It has proof marks "B90 S91" which were the very first pair of WaffenAmt (weapons office) inspectors assigned to Mauser during this year. Of a total of 55,838 estimated "G" date Lugers, this is one of about 3,556 that have this pair of inspection marks. It is the second rarest collector variation of "G" date Lugers. It's referred to as a G-S/42-CV1 variation in "The Mauser Parabellum" by Hallock and van De Kant.

postcontent: Have a 1999 Dodge Dakota R/T 5.9 for sale. This is a rare truck only 678 of these were made in 1999 that were black and a regular cab. It has a 5.9 [360] motor in it with 250 h.p.
